author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: Tales of the Wolf's new home(s)
body:
Nothing on the sites yet, but these WILL be my new homes for Lupin III
and MST3K.

Lupin III: Tales of the Wolf:
http://talesofthewolf.homepage.com

Mystery Science Theater 3000:
http://mst3000.homepage.com

So, why am I telling you all this, when there is nothing on the sites
anyway? So you can bookmark 'em early, silly!
Their advertising isn't as pestersome as Geocities, so I've decided to
stick. Lupin Chat is currently still at the Geocities site. (BTW, I'm
going to likely acquire a new chat room exclusively for MST3K, so it'll
be "Lupin chat only" soon).

-------------------------
TalesoftheWolf@Juno.com
OLD Lupin the Third/Mystery Science Theater 3000 Website is at:
http://www.geocities.com/talesofthewolf/
NEW:
http://talesofthewolf.homepage.com
http://mst3000.homepage.com
